metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4504 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Due to failure in validating the length provided by an attacker-crafted PPD PostScript document, CUPS and libppd are susceptible to a heap-based buffer overflow and possibly code execution. This issue has been fixed in CUPS version 2.4.7, released in September of 2023.

criterions.comment: cups: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libppd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
